entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
